tool.name: Ogr2Ogr
tool.description: Converts vector data from one format to another.
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py output_data_OutputedDataSourceName $output_data_OutputedDataSourceName name Ogr2Ogr F '$F' InputDSN '$InputDSN' OutputDSN '$OutputDSN' LCO '$LCO' DSCO '$DSCO' prefer $prefer response $response transmissionMode_OutputedDataSourceName $OutputSection_OutputedDataSourceName.transmissionMode_OutputedDataSourceName

param.name: InputDSN
param.label: The input data source name
param.help: The input data source name to use as source for convertion.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OutputedDataSourceName
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format
